::Hot Rod::

"I turned because they used the Matrix. Its power is almost super
natural. And I would never let them hurt you. I'd sooner destroy
Cybertron. I could speak on your pardon. They wont kill you. I promiss.
I only wanted to reprogram you because you could make a better decision.
Dont you understand that you cant make a decision between the Alliance
and me with that program. It will make you always say Alliance. Not
because thats what you want, but because thats what they want."
